EmailTemplate.name: 202103_Americas_JetWave_DT.202103_Americas_Email2_JetWave_DT
EmailTemplate.subject: Stay always connected with Honeywell´s JetWave
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell’s JetWave provides in-flight Wi-Fi that is fast, reliable and available anytime, worldwide at any altitude.
JetWave is the hardware solution facilitating connection to Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service, delivering an in-the-air broadband experience comparable to on-the-ground connections. By selecting JetWave, you’ll be enabling your passengers with ‘office equivalent’ productivity and ‘home-equivalent’ connectivity.
JetWave was designed for fast, easy installation in your business aircraft. JetWave uses either a tail-mounted antenna, for mid-size business jets, or a fuselage-mounted version for larger aircraft and can be installed by the Honeywell Experts at Clay Lacy Aviation.
Rely on Clay Lacy Aviation, an Authorized Honeywell Dealer, for factory-trained installation at a full-service FAA Repair Station in Van Nuys, California.
Contact Clay Lacy Aviation today to get a quote or for installation details on your Dassault Falcon, Bombardier Global or Challenger aircraft. GET A QUOTE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/sky-is-no-longer-the-limit]]>
